text.content:
Equipment & Items

System for managing, equipping, and using items

Weapon Properties

PropertyDescription
AmmunitionCan attack only if you have ammunition
FinesseUse STR or DEX for attack/damage
HeavySmall creatures have Disadvantage
LightSuitable for two-weapon fighting
LoadingFire only one piece of ammunition per action
RangeNormal/long range in feet
ReachAdds 5 feet to reach
ThrownCan be thrown for ranged attack
Two-HandedRequires two hands to use
VersatileCan use with one or two hands (different damage)

Weapon Mastery

MasteryBenefit
CleaveHit another creature within 5 ft on hit
GrazeDeal damage equal to ability modifier on miss
NickMake extra attack as part of Attack action
PushPush target 10 feet away on hit
SapGive target Disadvantage on next attack
SlowReduce target's Speed by 10 feet
ToppleKnock target Prone on failed save
VexGain Advantage on next attack vs target

Armor Class

Unarmored: 10 + DEX

Light: Armor AC + DEX

Medium: Armor AC + DEX (max +2)

Heavy: Armor AC only

Shield: +2 AC

Attunement

  • Maximum 3 attuned items
  • Requires Short Rest to attune
  • Item must be within 100 feet

Carrying Capacity

Capacity: STR × 15 pounds

Encumbered: Weight > 5 × STR (Speed -10)

Heavily Encumbered: Weight > 10 × STR (Speed -20, Disadvantage)
